question: Month of April

Psalm 49:3 “My mouth shall speak wisdom” According to thy name, O God, so it thy praise unto the ends of the earth: thy right hand is full of ___. Can anyone who trust in their wealth or boast themselves in their multitude of their riches redeem their brother? For when he dieth he shall carry ___ away: his glory shall not descend after him.

James 1:17 “Every good gift and every perfect gift is from above” Who did James address his letter to? If any of you lack ___, let him ask of God, that giveth to all men liberally, and upbraided not; and it shall be given him. ___ is the man that endureth temptation: for when he is tried, he shall receive the crown of life, which the Lord hath promised to them that love him.
Hebrews 4:12 “The word of God is living” Who is the great priest? ___ not your hearts, as in the provocation, in the day of temptation in the wilderness: What is sharper than any twoedged sword?

Philippians 4:13 “I can do all things through Christ who strengthens me” Who is the author of the book of Philippians? Be careful for ____; but in everything by prayer and supplication with thanksgiving let your request be made known unto God. But my God shall supply ___ your need according to his riches in glory by Christ Jesus.

Romans 15:13 “May the God of hope fill you with all joy and peace” Now the God of ___ and consolation grant you to be like-minded one toward another according to Christ Jesus. Let us therefore follow after the things which make for ___, and things wherewith one may edify another. Nevertheless, brethren, I have written the more boldly unto you in some sort, as putting you in mind, because of the ___ that is given to me of God.

Acts 3:19 “Repent therefore and be converted” Who said “Silver and gold have I none”? Who is the Prince of life? And it shall come to pass, that every soul, which will not hear that prophet, shall be ___ from among the people.
1 Corinthians 10:12 “Take heed lest [you] fall” Who is the author of the book of I Corinthians? Wherefore, my dearly beloved, flee from ___. Let no man seek his own, but every man another's ___.

2 Corinthians 3:17 “Where the Spirit of the Lord is there is liberty” For if the ministration of condemnation be glory, much more doth the ministration of righteousness exceed in ___. e	a & b Lest Satan should get an advantage of us: for we are not ___ of his devices. But even unto this day, when Moses is read, the veil is upon their ___.

Galatians 5:1 “Stand fast therefore in the liberty [of Christ]” The ___ of the Lord Jesus Christ, and the love of God, and the communion of the Holy Ghost, be with you all. But as then he that was born after the flesh persecuted him that was born after the ___, even so it is now. e.	None of the above For all the law is fulfilled in one word, even in this; Thou shalt ___ thy neighbor as thyself.
Ephesians 1:7 “In [Christ] we have redemption through His blood” When were we chosen by God? That we should be to the ___ of his glory, who first trusted in Christ. Who is the head of the Church?
options: When we first prayed to him
Before the foundation of the world

question: Ephesians 2:10 “We are His workmanship” But God, who is rich in ___, for his great love wherewith he loved us. For he is our ___, who hath made both one, and hath broken down the middle wall of partition between us. And hath put all things under his __, and gave him to be the head over all things to the church.

Philippians 3:14 “I press toward the goal for the prize” For we are the circumcision which worship God in the ___, and rejoice in Christ Jesus, and have no confidence in the flesh. That I may know him, and the power of his ___, and the fellowship of his sufferings, being made comfortable unto his death. For our conversation is in __; from whence also we look for the savior, the Lord Jesus Christ.

John 15:3 “You are already clean because of the word spoken to you” But that the world may know that I __ the father; and as the Father gave me commandment, even so  I do. Arise, let us go hence. Greater love hath no man than this, that a man __ his life for his friends. Herein is my Father glorified, that ye __ much fruit; so shall ye be my disciples.
Galatians 6:14 Boast only in the Cross of Jesus For every man shall bear his own ___. If we live in the spirit, let us also walk in the ___. Can God be mocked?

Isaiah 54:17 “No weapon formed against you shall prosper” For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great __ will I gather thee. For the mountains shall depart, and the hills be removed; but my ___ shall not depart from thee, neither shall the covenant of my peace be removed, saith the Lord that hath mercy on thee. Incline your ear, and come unto me: hear, and your soul shall __; and I will make an everlasting covenant with you, even the sure mercies of David.
Romans 6:6 “Our old man was crucified with [Christ]” What shall we say then? Shall we continue in ___, that grace may abound? Does death have dominion on Jesus? For he that is dead is freed from ___.

Revelation 12:11 Overcoming the enemy by the Blood of the Lamb What is another name of Satan? If any man have an ear, let him ___. And they overcame him by the blood of the ___, and by the word of their testimony.

James 4:7 “Submit to God; resist the devil” Ye ask, and receive not, because ye ask amiss, that ye may ___ it upon your lusts. ___ yourselves in the sight of the Lord, and he shall lift you up. But now ye rejoice in your boastings: all such rejoicing is ___.

Philippians 4:19 “God shall supply all your need” I can do ___ things through Christ which strengtheneth me. And the peace of God, which passeth all understanding, shall keep your __ and minds through Christ Jesus. Then saith he unto his disciples, The harvest truly is plenteous, but the ____ are few;

1 John 4:4 “He who is in you is greater than he who is in the world” And whatsoever we ask, we receive of him, because we keep his ___, and to those things that are pleasing in his sight. Beloved, let us love one another: for love is of ___; and every one that loveth is born of God, and knoweth God. We love him, because he __ loved us.

Proverbs 4:10 “Hear … and receive my sayings, and the years of your life will be many” For I give you good ____, forsake ye not my law. According to Proverbs 4, what is the principal thing? What must we take fast hold of?
Ecclesiastes 12:13 Man’s Whole Duty is to Fear God What is the whole duty of Man? When must we remember our Creator? What can the words of the wise be compared to?
options: In the days of our youth
answer: In the days of our youth

question: Ecclesiastes 3: 1-8 There is Time for Everything According to Ecclesiastes 3, which of these times come first; 'time to speak', 'time to keep silent'? What does God give to a man that is good in his sight? Why should every man eat and drink, and enjoy the good of all his labor?
options: Both come at the same time
It's gain through his hard work

question: Lamentations 3:24 “The LORD is my portion” Why would you hope in the LORD? Why are we not consumed? Let us lift up our ___ with our hands unto God in the heavens.
options: Because we are more than conquerors

question: Isaiah 54:4 “Do not fear, for you will not be ashamed” Why was Jesus wounded? Who is the husband of the widows? For a small moment have I forsaken thee; but with great ___ will I gather thee.
Ecclesiastes 12:14 “God will bring every work into judgment” What is the whole duty of man? What did the preacher teach people? Where shall the dust return to?
Mark 11:22-25 Principles of Asking and Receiving What did Jesus ask his disciples to have? How can we make sure that we receive what we ask in prayers? What happens if we do not forgive others?
options: Believe in what we are praying for
God will not forgive us also
answer: God will not forgive us also

question: Psalm 127:1 “Unless the LORD builds the house, they labor in vain” The Lord hath done great things for us; wherefore we are ___. What are children? Who gives the fruit of the womb?

John 14:16 God the Father Will Give You the Holy Spirit as a Helper Who said to the Lord that they did not know where he (the Lord) is going? What can be asked in the name of Jesus? Who is the Holy Spirit? Why can't the world receive the Holy Spirit?

Psalm 16:11 “You will show me the path of life” What happens in the presence of the Lord? The Lord is the portion of mine ___ and of my cup: thou maintainest my lot. What will happen to those who seek after other gods? Month of May
Isaiah 54:10 “Nor shall My covenant of peace be removed” Who is Isaiah 54 is addressed to? Who shall the children be taught of? Who is the husband of the widower?

Proverbs 6:2 “You are snared by the words of your mouth” For the ways of man are ___ the eyes of the Lord, and he pondereth all his goings. Who are we recommended to learn from? According to Proverbs 6, what happens to the one who sleeps or fold his/her hands?
options: They'll be used by the Lord mightily

question: Psalm 9:7 “The LORD shall endure forever” What will happen to your enemies if you trust in the Lord? Who is the refuge of the oppressed? What is the Lord known by?
Psalm 77:12 “I will also meditate on all Your work” What is the way of God? According to Psalm 77 who lead the way of God children? How is the Lord to the kings of the earth?
Psalm 103:12 “He removed our transgressions from us” Which of these does the Lord cover his children with? How is the Lord? Who does the Lord has pitied on?
Joel 2:12-13 “Turn to Me with all your heart” Who was Joel's father? How is the Lord expecting his children to turn to him? What did the Lord promise to send to his children after repentance?
Psalm 119:15 “I will meditate on Your precepts” Why must we hid God word in our heart? Who does the Lord rebuke? Blessed are they that keep his ____, and that seek him with the whole heart.
options: So that we may proclaim it
So that we might not sin
So that we might have eternal life

question: Romans 5:8 “While we were still sinners Christ died for us” How have Christians been justified? e	a & b How does God demonstrate his love for us? What does suffering produce?

2 Timothy 2:3-7 “May the Lord give you understanding in all things” Who is the author of 2 Timothy? Thou therefore endure ___ as a good soldier of Jesus Christ If we suffer, we shall also ___ with him: if we deny him, he also will deny us.
Revelation 3:5 “He who overcomes shall be clothed in white garments” Which book comes immediately before Revelation? How will Jesus come like? What will happen to those who are victorious?
options: Their names will never be removed from the book of life

question: Matthew 6:26-31 God Cares for Our Well-being Who feed the birds of the earth? Who can serve two masters? What must Christians worry about?
Matthew 6:33 “Seek first the kingdom of God” What happens if you make the kingdom of God your priority? Why must you not worry about tomorrow? Where must we store our treasures?
options: God will provide all you need
Because God hasn't promise us tomorrow
Because tomorrow will worry about itself
answer: Because tomorrow will worry about itself

question: Matthew 16:19 “I will give you the keys of the kingdom of heaven” To whom did Jesus say you are the rock? Who was Simon's father? Why did Jesus rebuke Peter?
options: Because Peter said Jesus will not suffer

question: Galatians 1:4 Christ Gave Himself to Deliver Us from Evil Why did Jesus give himself? Why did Paul marvel? But I certify you, brethren, that the gospel which was ____ of me is not after man.
options: Because Galatians turned away from God
Because he was not well received
Because the offering was not enough

question: James 1:22 “Be doers of the word, and not hearers only” Which of these attitudes is recommended by James? Can we be tempted by God? According to James what does the testing of our faith produce?

Philippians 4:7 “The peace of God … will guard your hearts and minds” Who is Paul pleading with, to have the same mind? What is Paul recommending Philippians to put in practice? What must we be careful about?
Habakkuk 2:4 “The just shall live by his faith” Where did the Lord ask Habakkuk to write the vision on? When is the vision for? Who was Habakkuk?

Proverbs 28:13 “He who covers his sins will not prosper” What is a poor man that oppressed the poor compare to? What happens to the prayer of those that turn away their ear from hearing the law? The wicked flee when no man pursueth: but the righteous are ___ as a lion.
options: A sweeping rain which leaves no food
answer: A sweeping rain which leaves no food

question: Psalm 19:14 “Let the words of my mouth and the meditation of my heart be acceptable in Your sight” How is the law of the Lord? How are the judgments of the Lord?

Deuteronomy 8:18 “It is [God] who gives you power to get wealth” Which of the commandments shall be observed? For the Lord thy God bringeth thee into a __ land, a land of brooks of water, of fountains and depths that spring out of valleys and hills. Who gives you the power to get wealth?

Psalm 63:5 “My soul shall be satisfied” Who does power belong to? Thus will I ___ thee while I live: I will lift up my hands in thy name. Also unto thee, O Lord, belongeth __: for thou renderest to every man according to his work.
Proverbs 13:22 God Stores the Sinner’s Wealth for the Righteous What does a good man do? What awaits those who despise the word? What awaits those that refuse instruction?
options: Leaves an inheritance to his children

question: Isaiah 49:7-9 “I will preserve You and give You as a covenant to the people to restore the earth” And said unto me, thou art my servant, O Israel, in whom I will be ___. Why must we shout for joy, and rejoice?
options: Because the Lord comforts his people
Because the Lord will have compassion on the afflicted
Because it is wise to do so

question: 2 Peter 2:9 God delivers the Godly from Temptations Who was Peter? How does prophecy come?
Deuteronomy 31:6 “Be strong and of good courage” Why must we not be afraid? Who carried the ark of covenant? Who was Joshua's father?
options: Because the Lord is with us
Because there is nothing to be afraid of

question: Ephesians 5:19-20 “Singing and making melody … to the Lord” And walk in ___, as Christ also hath loved us, and hath given himself for us an offering and a sacrifice to God for a sweetsmelling savor. And have no ___ with the unfruitful works of darkness, but rather reprove them. When must ‘we’ Christians give thanks?

Ephesians 4:2 “With longsuffering, bearing with one another in love” There is one body, and one ___, even as ye are called in one hope of your calling. This I say therefore, and testify in the Lord, that ye henceforth walk __ as other gentiles walk, in the vanity of their heart. How are we saved?
1 Peter 5:10 “May the God of all grace … strengthen and settle you” According to 1 Peter 5, who will restore us? Who was Peter? Casting all your care upon him; for he ___ for you.

Luke 10:20 “Your names are written in heaven” What is the purpose of the authority that has been given to believers? What has been committed to Jesus by God? And the seventy returned again with joy, saying Lord, even the ___ are subject unto us through thy name
options: To overcome all the power of the enemy

question: Matthew 11:28 “Come to Me all you who labor and are heavy laden” ___ are delivered unto me of my Father: and no man knoweth the Son, but the Father; neither knoweth any man the Father, save the Son, and he to whomsoever the Son will reveal him. Who is the Lord of the Sabbath? He that findeth his life shall __ it: and he that loseth his life for my sake shall find it.

Psalm 84:5-7 “Blessed is the man whose strength is in you” Blessed are they that ___ in thy house: they will be still praising thee. O Lord of hosts, blessed is the man that ___ in thee. Thou hast forgiven the iniquity of thy people, thou hast covered ___ their sin. Month of June

Joshua 24:15 “As for me and my house, we will serve the LORD” Now therefore fear the Lord, and serve him in sincerity and in truth: and put away the __ which your fathers served on the other side of the flood, and in Egypt; and serve the Lord. If ye ___ the Lord, and serve strange gods, then he will turn and do you hurt, and consume you, after that he hath done you good. Take good heed therefore unto yourselves, that ye __ the Lord your God.

2 Peter 3:9 “The Lord is not slack concerning His promise” But, beloved, be not ignorant of this one thing, that one day is with the Lord as a __ years Nevertheless we, according to his promise, look for new ___ and a new earth, wherein dwelleth righteousness. But grow in __, and in the knowledge of our Lord and Savior Jesus Christ.

Matthew 23:11 “He who is greatest among you shall be your servant” Jesus said unto him, thou shalt love the Lord thy God with all thy __, and with all thy soul, and with all thy mind. And call no man your father upon the ___: for one is your Father, which is in heaven.

Deuteronomy 29:29 “The secret things belong to the LORD” Keep therefore the words of this covenant, and do them, that ye may ___ in all that ye do. And the Lord shall ___ him unto evil out of all the tribes of Israel, according to all the curses of the covenant that are written in this book of the law. Then men shall say, because they have ___ the covenant of the Lord God of their fathers, which he made with them when he brought forth out of the land of Egypt.

Luke 14:11 “Whoever exalts himself will be humbled” And thou shalt be ___; for they cannot recompense thee: for thou shalt be recompensed at the resurrection of the just. And whosoever doth not bear his cross, and come after me, cannot be my ___. Salt is good: but if the salt have lost his ___, wherewith shall it be seasoned?

Isaiah 53:12 “Christ bore the sins of many” Surely he hath borne our ___, and carried our sorrows: yet we did esteem him stricken, smitten of God, and afflicted. For ye shall not go out with haste, nor go by ___: for the Lord will go before you; and the God of Israel will be your rearward. Behold, my servant shall deal prudently, he shall be ___ and extolled, and be very high.

John 17 Christ’s Prayer for Those Who Are in Him I have glorified thee on the earth: I have ____ the work which thou gavest me to do. Who is Jesus praying for? Sanctify them through thy truth: thy word is ____.

Hebrews 11:1 “Faith is the substance of things hoped for” For yet a little while, and he that shall come will come, and will not ___. e	b & c How must the just live? But without faith it is ___ to please him: for he that cometh to God must believe that he is, and that he is a rewarder of them that diligently seek him.

Psalm 20:4 “May He grant you according to your heart’s desire” Send thee help from the ___, and strengthen thee out of Zion. Does the Lord save his anointed? e.	None of the above ___, Lord: let the king hear us when we call.

Psalm 37:3 “Trust in the LORD and do good" Let not the foot of ___ come against me, and let not the hand of the wicked remove me. ___ thy way unto the Lord; and he shall give thee the desires of thine heart.
Matthew 26:41 “Watch and pray” Who said to Jesus he would not deny him? Where did Jesus take Peter, and the two sons of Zebedee to pray? But how then shall the ___ be fulfilled, that thus it must be?

Deuteronomy 31:8 “[The LORD] will not leave you nor forsake you” Be strong and be of a good ___, fear not, nor be afraid of them: for the Lord thy God, he it is that doth go with thee; he will not fail thee, nor forsake thee. What is the year of release also known as? Who frequent was the year of release?

Exodus 13:21-22 “The LORD went before them” Sanctify unto me all the ___, whatsoever openeth the womb among the children of Israel, both of man and of beast: it is mine. ____ days thou shalt eat unleavened bread, and in the seventh day shall be a feast to the Lord. Now the sojourning of the children of Israel, who dwelt in Egypt, was ___ and thirty years.

Genesis 1 The Beginning And the evening and the morning were the __ day. According to Genesis 1, did God create only male? And God blessed them, and God said unto them, be ___, and multiply, and replenish the earth, and subdue it
Genesis 2:7 “Man became a living being” When did God rest? Where did God put the man he created?
Genesis 2:23 Woman was Formed from Man What was Adam doing when Eve was created? What did Adam say when he first saw Eve? According to Genesis 2 who shall leave their mother and father?
Genesis 3 The Fall of Mankind What did the serpent say would happen if the woman ate the fruit? How is the serpent described in Genesis 3? What happened when Adam and Eve ate the fruit?
Genesis 6:18 “I will establish My Covenant with you” Who was commanded to make an ark? Why did God ask the ark to be built? The earth also was ____ before God, and the earth was filled with violence.
options: He wanted to send his creations to exile
He wanted to show his power
He wanted to send a flood to destroy those who were unfaithful

question: Genesis 9:1 “Be fruitful and multiply” Who did God bless and commanded to be fruitful? Who is the father of Canaan? While the earth remaineth, ____ and harvest, and cold and heat, and summer and winter, and day and night shall not cease.
Genesis 12:1-2 “I will bless you and make your name great” Did God tell Abram where he was taking him? Which of these blessings did God not pronounced on Abram?
options: You will be a great nation

question: Genesis 16 Do Not Alter God’s Covenant with You What was the name of Sarai’s handmaid? What was the name of Abram first child? And Abram was fourscore and ___ years old, when Hagar bare Ishmael to Abram

Genesis 17:10 “This is My Covenant Which You Shall Keep” And I will make my covenant between me and thee, and will ___ thee excedingly What was Abram name changed to? What was to be the sign of covenant between God and Abram?
Genesis 18:14 “Is anything too hard for the LORD?” What was Sarah reaction when the servant of God said she would have a child? And the Lord said, shall I __ from Abraham that thing which I do.
1 Kings 4:29 “God gave Solomon wisdom and exceedingly great understanding” Who was Jehoshaphat’s father? How many proverbs did Solomon speak? How many songs did Solomon have?

Proverbs 1:1-4 The Proverbs of Solomon Who was Solomon’s father? A wise man will hear, and will increase ___; and a man of understanding shall attain unto wise counsels. My son, hear the instruction of thy ___, and forsake not the law of thy mother.
Matthew 12:42 Seek the Wisdom of Solomon How is a tree known? For out of the abundance of the heart the mouth ____. Who does Jesus say is his brother, sister, and mother?
options: Those that are born in Israel
Those that do the will of his Father (God)

question: 1 Kings 3:6-15 “I have given you a wise and understanding heart” Where did the Lord appear to Solomon in a dream? What did Solomon ask of the Lord? Who was Benaiah’s father?
Proverbs 2:6 “The LORD gives wisdom” Who gives wisdom? So that thou incline, thine ear unto wisdom, and apply thine heart to ___.
2 Chronicles 1:8-12 “Let your promise … be established; give me wisdom and knowledge” What did Solomon ask of God? Apart from granting Solomon request, what else did God promise him?
2 Kings 17:35 “You shall not fear other gods” For how long did the king of Assyria besiege Samaria? Why was the Lord angry against Israel? Who were Adrammelech and Anammelech?
